          <title>
            <string language="en">Making and recycling glass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glas bilden und aufbereitend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faisant et réutilisant le verre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo e recycling o vidro</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Haciendo y reciclando el cristal</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates how to make glass from limestone, sand and soda and its recycling.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre comment faire le verre à 
partir de la pierre à chaux, sable et soude et sa réutilisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra como fazer o vidro da

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra come fare il vetro da
